item.title: Meiko’s 15th Anniversary Illustration Collaboration Recruitment!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:

Prizes The artistic works that have been chosen for adoption will be …

The post Meiko’s 15th Anniversary Illustration Collaboration Recruitment! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
General Details

MEIKO celebrated her 15th Anniversary on November 5, 2019. As per this announcement on the Hatsune Miku official blog, though a variety of goods and events have been already conducted, Piapro will be opening a collaboration for illustrators to participate in!

Prizes

The artistic works that have been chosen for adoption will be awarded with MEIKO goods! As well, your art will be showcased at various Crypton Future Media events!

Participation Rules

Winners will be selected around this July of 2020, with the announcement being made on the Piapro site and via email.

You must be registered on Piapro – if you don’t have an account yet, you can sign up here. In addition, you must follow the terms and conditions of Piapro and the application rules of this collaboration.

Illustration Content

You must include the main character, MEIKO in your piece.

In addition, you can optionally include side characters: from Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, and KAITO.

Post Format

  • Size: 29.7cm (Height) x 42cm (Width) – “A3 Horizontal Size”
  • Format: PNG or JPEG format
  • Color Mode: RGB
  • Resolution: 300 dpi or higher

Additional Notes

Your illustration must not contain any text, with the exception of attaching characters’ specific number logos to their arms (example: Hatsune Miku’s iconic “01″).

Derived characters, such as Snow Miku, Miku Dayo, cannot be utilized.

  • Character costumes that are drawn on official product packages are OK
  • Costumes appearing in games, anime, manga, etc. are not permitted.

Your posted work must be listed as a “Post without license” to prevent it from being used in other collaborations until a decision has been made for this one.

Conclusion

Many best wishes to those of you who choose to participate in the collaboration, and I hope you can get selected as a winner!
